text: İsmail Kahraman (born 1940) is a Turkish politician. He is a member of the Justice and Development Party (AKP). He was the 27th Speaker of the Grand National Assembly from 22 November 2015 to 7 July 2018. He has been the Member of Parliament for İstanbul's first electoral district since 1 November 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== *MP profile on the Grand National Assembly website *Collection of all relevant news items at Haberler.com Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Turkey
title: İsmail Kahraman
